name: process_emails
description: Fetches recent emails and summarizes them using OpenAI's GPT model.

num_emails.description: The number of recent emails to fetch and summarize. Default is 10 if not specified.

function.name: process_emails
function.description: Fetches recent emails using Microsoft Graph API and summarizes them using OpenAI's GPT model.

num_emails.description: The number of recent emails to fetch and summarize. Default is 10 if not specified.
